lines.text: Wait mom I can't keep up

[Being held at gunpoint]
I'm not giving you the codes

[Puts gun away]
I already have the codes... if you had given them to me I would've shot you for treason

[to Elizabeth]
I see that marine training is finally being put to some good use
I have served my country both on the battlefield and in the office I must do what needs to be done
Have you been in battle Mark?
No of course you haven't you make speeches...
the closest you've come to combat was addressing the troops
